typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'document',
	systemColumns: true) ~> moviesCosmos
moviesCosmos derive(movies = @(year=movies.year,
		genres=movies.genres,
		rating=movies.rating,
		movieid=movies.movieid,
		reverseTitle=reverse(movies.title),
		title=movies.title)) ~> MakeHierarchy
MakeHierarchy sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'document',
	partitionKey: ['/movies/title'],
	throughput: 2000) ~> sink1
